entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
